chunks.content: MCP integration with Kiro CLI allows you to connect to Model Context Protocol servers for enhanced functionality. Use the mcp-add command to add new servers and mcp-config-set to configure them.

Setting up custom agents in Kiro CLI involves creating agent profiles with specific tools and configurations. Agents can be specialized for different tasks like code analysis, documentation, or AWS management.
OpenTelemetry tracing in Kiro CLI provides detailed insights into operation performance. Use the enhanced terminal output to monitor trace spans, events, and metrics in real-time.
